com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling

Class AbstractJournalingPersistentStoreIndexer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling.AbstractJournalingPersistentStoreIndexer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the data type to which write request values get deserialized
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer

    public abstract class AbstractJournalingPersistentStoreIndexer<T>
extends Object
implements JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer
    Base JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer implementation which uses an IBytesSegmentExternalizer to deserialize write request values when scanning the journal.

    • Method Detail

      • index

        protected abstract void index(T deserializedValue,
                              long offset)
        Indexes an entry using a deserialized value scanned from the journal.
        Parameters:
        deserializedValue - a deserialized value read from the journal
        offset - the offset of the value in the journal

      • remove

        protected abstract void remove(T deserializedValue,
                               long offset)
        Removes an entry from the index.
        Parameters:
        deserializedValue - a deserialized value read from the journal identifying the entry to delete
        offset - the offset of the value in the journal

      • index

        public final void index(IByteArrayStore.WriteRequest writeRequest,
                        long offset)
        Description copied from interface: JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer
        Updates the index with the given value and offset. This method is called by the store when scanning its journal or applying replicated write requests.
        Specified by:
        index in interface JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer
        Parameters:
        writeRequest - the write request read from the journal when scanning
        offset - the write request's offset in the journal
